metadata.title: CVE-2024-2616 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memoryconditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
